description.brazilian: Derrote a rainha má antes que você destrua o espelho mágico
description.english: Defeat the evil queen before you destroy the magic mirror
description.french: Vaincre la méchante reine avant de détruire le miroir magique

description.japanese: 魔法の鏡を破壊する前に邪悪な女王を倒せ

description.portuguese: Derrota a rainha má antes de destruíres o espelho mágico
description.russian: Победите злую королеву, прежде чем уничтожите волшебное зеркало
description.schinese: 在摧毁魔镜之前打败邪恶女王
description.spanish: Derrota a la reina malvada antes de destruir el espejo mágico

description.brazilian: Derrote o lobo realmente mau sem que ele possa atacar em sua forma final
description.english: Defeat the really bad wolf without it being able to attack in its final form
description.french: Vaincre le méchant loup sans qu'il puisse attaquer sous sa forme finale
description.german: Besiege den wirklich bösen Wolf, ohne dass er in seiner letzten Form angreifen konnte
description.japanese: 本当に悪いオオカミを、最終形態で攻撃できないように倒す
description.polish: Pokonaj naprawdę złego wilka bez możliwości ataku w jego ostatecznej formie
description.portuguese: Derrotar o lobo muito mau sem que ele possa atacar na sua forma final
description.russian: Победите очень злого волка, не дав ему возможности напасть в своей последней форме
description.schinese: 打败真正的恶狼，让它无法以最终形态发动攻击
description.spanish: Derrota al lobo malo de verdad sin que pueda atacar en su forma final
